title: Spider
creator_credit: Neill S. Bell, Victorian College of the Arts, School of Film and Television and Kyle Neaves
brief_description: Charts a man’s gradual progress into obsession with catching the spiders that he discovers have infested his basement. Shot using the latest miniature camera technology, the story is told through the eyes of a spider.
creator_credit_for_label: Neill S. Bell, Victorian College of the Arts, School of Film and Television and Kyle Neaves
